title: Himi 34
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e huafa ‘o Sīsū
‘Oku ma’olunga,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē
Pea fai ma’u ai pē.
2.
’I he maama ‘i ‘olunga
‘Oku lahi ia,
Pea lahi hono ‘aonga
Ki he kakai hia.
3.
Pea manavahē foki
‘A e kau tēvolo
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū
Pea nau puna ai.
4.
Ka ‘oku fiemālie
‘I hono huafa
‘A e kakai angahala
Kuo loto liliu.
5.
‘Oku ne motumotuhi
Honau ngaahi ha’i.
Mo ne fakamālohi’i
‘A e loto vaivai.
6.
Pea fakaakeake,
‘A e kakai mate;
Pea nau fiemālie
‘I he’ene ‘ofa. *
